name: Science Torture
description:
This was a game made for the BulletHell GameJam 25/04/22!

This game was made by:

  • Velcro (Programmer and Artists)
  • Abstrkt (Sound Designer and Music)

Heads Up! You need to press SHOOT while on top of an item to actually buy it!

CONTROLS:

  • Z to Shoot and Interact
  • C to Lock your position and aim without moving
  • Arrow keys to Move
  • Space Bar to Jump
  • R to restart

You need to press Z while touching the item you want to buy to properly buy it (And have the money of course)
